General.Name: Youngy Health Co Ltd
General.Description: Youngy Health Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of sauna equipment in China. Its products include infrared sauna, traditional sauna, and foot sauna; and portable steam and infrared sauna products, as well as air purifiers. The company also offers carbon heating painting products, functional sofas and chairs, saunalux, and SUP and boat products. It exports its sauna products to approximately 70 countries. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.

3.Name: Ms. Jun  Liang
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
